medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began after recent chemotherapy sessions, with malaise reported shortly after each session. The patient started feeling increasingly weak since earlier unspecified date, occasionally tiring after 10 minutes of walking. The weekend prior to admission, he experienced a poor appetite and syncopized twice, each episode preceded by presyncope. He reported a low blood pressure of 85/61 at home.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of pancreatic cancer and type II diabetes mellitus. History of atrial fibrillation that developed years ago and resolved after switching jobs. Previous pancreatic cancer surgery attempted (Whipple) aborted due to metastatic disease.
